info.name: YOLOv5 for Renesas DRP-AI
info.description: Transfer learning model using YOLOv5 v5 branch with yolov5s.pt weights. This block is only compatible with Renesas DRP-AI.

parameters.name: Number of training cycles
parameters.help: Number of epochs to train the neural network on.

parameters.name: Learning rate
parameters.help: How fast the neural network learns, if the network overfits quickly, then lower the learning rate.
